summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Board of Public Works to purchase the timber on all those portions of Government Lot Two (2), Section Twenty (20); the Southwest One-quarter of the Southwest One-quarter (SW 1/4 of SW 1/4) of Section Twenty-two (22); Government Lots One (10, Two (2), Three (3), and Four (4), and the Southwest One-quarter of the Southeast One-quarter (SW 1/4 of SE 1/4) of Section Twenty-six (26), all in Township Twenty-two (22) North, Range Nine (9) East, W. M., lying below elevation 1650 City Datum, and appropriating the sum of Three Thousand Five Hundred Fifty-seven and 20/100 ($3,557.20) Dollars from the Cedar River Watershed Condemnation Fund to pay the cost of acquiring the same.
